## Description {#details}

A template wrapper used to implement the polymorphic API.

Can be instantiated for any object which provides a <code>run</code> method accepting an <code>IRUnitT&amp;</code> and an <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/analysismanager">AnalysisManager&lt;IRUnit&gt;</a>&amp;</code>. It requires the pass to be a copyable object.

Definition at line 72 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/passmanagerinternal-h">PassManagerInternal.h</a>.

## Public Member Functions

### isRequired() {#a9630c2da082b26c54a8951b2d0980d4c}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;typename IRUnitT, typename PassT, typename AnalysisManagerT, typename... ExtraArgTs&gt;</>}
  prototype={<>bool llvm::detail::PassModel&lt; IRUnitT, PassT, AnalysisManagerT, ExtraArgTs &gt;::isRequired () const</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Polymorphic method to let a pass optionally exempted from skipping by <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/passinstrumentation">PassInstrumentation</a>.

To opt-in, pass should implement <code>static bool <a href="#a9630c2da082b26c54a8951b2d0980d4c">isRequired()</a></code>. It&#39;s no-op to have <code>isRequired</code> always return false since that is the default.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/passmanagerinternal-h/#l00116">116</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/passmanagerinternal-h">PassManagerInternal.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### run() {#a75180e1269e5bc1ab15f89587ac1794c}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;typename IRUnitT, typename PassT, typename AnalysisManagerT, typename... ExtraArgTs&gt;</>}
  prototype={<>PreservedAnalyses llvm::detail::PassModel&lt; IRUnitT, PassT, AnalysisManagerT, ExtraArgTs &gt;::run (IRUnitT &amp; IR, AnalysisManagerT &amp; AM, ExtraArgTs... ExtraArgs)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
The polymorphic API which runs the pass over a given IR entity.

Note that actual pass object can omit the analysis manager argument if desired. Also that the analysis manager may be null if there is no analysis manager in the pass pipeline.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/passmanagerinternal-h/#l00089">89</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/passmanagerinternal-h">PassManagerInternal.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
